summaryOfNewsArticle: The Cultural Heritage Festival, held from August 10 to August 15, 2023, celebrated traditional practices and local customs in the region. The event brought together the Local Community for cultural activities, including traditional music, dance, and crafts. The festival emphasized the importance of preserving heritage and strengthening community bonds through shared traditions.
title: Cultural Heritage Festival Celebrates Traditional Practices and Community Identity
